title: Which are the best immunity boosters in Ayurveda? Can you suggest their immensely useful therapeutic value?
description: Answer (1 of 16): Guduchi (in Sanskrit) (Giloy in Hindi) (Tinospora Cordyfolia) also known as Amrita is the best immunobooster in Ayurved. It is a creeper and is even more effective if it grows on a Neem tree. It's vine is dried and powdered. It is sold in the markets as pieces of dried stem, pow...
